com.parkingtycoon.controllers

Class BluePrintsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.BaseController
      • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.UpdatableController
        • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.BluePrintsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable

    public class BluePrintsController
extends UpdatableController
    The responsibility of this controller is to build and demolish buildings using the information of the BluePrints and the input of the player.
    Author:
    Hilko Janssen

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BluePrintsController()

    • Constructor Detail

      • BluePrintsController

        public BluePrintsController()
        This constructor will create the BluePrintsController and register inputListeners.

    • Method Detail

      • unsetToBeBuilt

        private void unsetToBeBuilt()
        This method is used to cancel the preview of a to be built BluePrint

      • setToBeBuilt

        private void setToBeBuilt(BluePrintModel bluePrint)
        This method is used to show a preview of a to be built BluePrint. With this preview the player can see and choose where the building will be placed.
        Parameters:
        bluePrint - The bluePrint that is going to be built

      • toggleDemolishMode

        public void toggleDemolishMode()
        This method will toggle the demolishMode on or off. With the demolishMode the player can choose to demolish a building.

      • setNextToBeBuilt

        public void setNextToBeBuilt(BluePrintModel nextToBeBuilt)
        This method is used to notify the controller that the player wants to see a preview of a BluePrint
        Parameters:
        nextToBeBuilt - The bluePrint that the player wants to see previewed.

      • update

        public void update()
        In the update method the controller will check if the player has clicked. If so, the controller will build or demolish an building, depending on what mode the controller is in.

      • unsetToBeDemolished

        private void unsetToBeDemolished()
        This method will remove the red Highlight that is being shown on a building. The red Highlight is being shown when a player hovers the mouse on a building while in demolishMode.

      • canBuild

        public boolean canBuild(BluePrintModel bluePrint,
                        int originX,
                        int originY)
        Checks if a building can be build on a given position
        Parameters:
        bluePrint - The bluePrint of the building
        originX - The x-position of the building
        originY - The y-position of the building
        Returns:
        Can the building be build here?

      • build

        public void build(BluePrintModel bluePrint,
                  int originX,
                  int originY,
                  int angle,
                  int floorIndex)
        This method will build a building using the information provided with the BluePrint. It is not the responsibility of this method to check if it is allowed to build this building here. It is the responsibility of placeBuildingOnFloor() to actually place the building on one or multiple floors.
        Parameters:
        bluePrint - The BluePrint that contains information about the building that is going to be placed.
        originX - The x-position of the building
        originY - The y-position of the building
        angle - The angle of the building (min 0, max 3)
        floorIndex - The floor that this building has to be placed on.

      • placeBuildingOnFloor

        private void placeBuildingOnFloor(BuildingModel building,
                                  BluePrintModel bluePrint,
                                  int floorIndex)
        This building will actually place a building on a floor. You have to provide an already built building.
        Parameters:
        building - The building that has to be placed on a floor
        bluePrint - The bluePrint that was being used to build this building
        floorIndex - The floor that the building has to be placed on.

      • demolish

        public void demolish(BuildingModel building)
        This method will demolish a given building
        Parameters:
        building - The building that has to be demolished

      • removeBuildingFromFloor

        private void removeBuildingFromFloor(BuildingModel building,
                                     int floorIndex)
        This method will remove a demolished building from a floor
        Parameters:
        building - The building that was demolished
        floorIndex - The floor that the building was standing on
